amendment.description: Amendment establishes a national hotline administered by the Department of Justice and financed by a user fee for public access to the FBI database on sexual offenders.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to establish a national hotline administered by the Department of Justice and financed by a user fee for public access to the FBI database of convicted sexual predators.

action.text: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 175 (Roll No. 229).
